name: review-board
description: Review Board is a self-hosted code review tool that integrates with Git, SVN, and Mercurial. It includes inline comments, diff views, and workflow tracking for engineering teams.
features: Code review workflow: Submit, review, and approve code changes before merging to main branches.
Inline comments: Add feedback directly on specific lines of code in diff views.
Diff visualization: View side-by-side or unified diffs with syntax highlighting.
VCS integration: Connect to Git, SVN, Mercurial, and Perforce repositories.
Review requests: Create formal review requests with descriptions and reviewers.
Issue tracking: Link reviews to bug reports or feature requests for context.
Email notifications: Alert reviewers when new changes are submitted or comments added.
Review history: Track all feedback and revisions throughout the review process.
Pre-commit reviews: Catch issues before code enters the repository.
Access control: Define who can submit, review, or approve changes based on roles.
Dashboard views: Monitor pending reviews and team activity from a central interface.
API integration: Automate review workflows with REST API endpoints.
